definitions.definition: to be unwilling to oblige ; to disappoint , to inconvenience , not to cooperate .
examples: Sorry to disoblige everybody; I know you were depending on me to bring a good weather forecast for our fÃªte, but it is going to rain.

definitions.definition: To offend by an act of unkindness or incivility .

main_definition: ( British ) to be unwilling to oblige ; to disappoint , to inconvenience , not to cooperate .
secondary_definitions: ( British ) To offend by an act of unkindness or incivility .
